.method public hidebysig instance void Normalize() cil managed
Public Sub Normalize ()
public: void Normalize();

summary.span: 规范化指定的 结构。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范化维护其方向但其大小变为`1`。A normalized maintains its direction but its magnitude becomes `1`. 生成情况通常称作单元向量。The resulting is often called a unit vector. A除以规范化通过其大小。A is normalized by dividing the by its magnitude. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何正常化结构。The following example shows how to normalize a structure. [!code-csharp[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)] [!code-vb[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)]
